text.fulltitle: Eating At The BEST Reviewed INDIAN Restaurant In Los Angeles... (5 STARS WOW)
text.tags: brennentaylor; brennen taylor; brennen; taylor; taylorfam; india; best indian food; indian food; best reviewed; best reviewed indian food; eating indian food; first time; india covid; india news; eating at the best reviewed; eating at the best reviewed indian restaurant; brennen taylor 5 star; brennen taylor food review; brennen taylor foodie; foodie; food review; restaurant review; 5 star; 5 star indian foood; best indian fod; best reviewed indian;
